inducement.translation[0].definitions[0]: a reason for doing something, especially something that you will get as a result
financial inducements to attract good job candidates
Businesses were offered inducements to move to the area.
inducement.translation[1].definitions[0]: something such as money or a gift that you are offered to persuade you to do something
There has to be a good inducement for investors to commit money to risky but socially worthwhile ventures.
